Ancient Red Dragon.name: Fire Blast
Ancient Red Dragon.text: The Ancient Dragon floods the room in a torrent of never ending fire. Survival is unlikely.

Elder Brain.name: Psishatter
Elder Brain.text: The Elder Brain sings in your mind as you drift into an ethereal nothingness...

Pit Fiend.name: World Splitter
Pit Fiend.text: The Pit Fiend cleaves the earth with such force it splits a chasm 100 meters deep

Lich.name: Grotesque Masquerade
Lich.text: A marching army of a thousand undead traverse the hill beyond...

Solar.name: Heavenly Blast
Solar.text: The Solar drives its sword through you, through the earth, through the universe...

Wisdom Goblin.name: Clever Ploy
Wisdom Goblin.text: This is the most eloquent trap you have ever seen in your short life.
